decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been submitted to demonstrate that the internal water usage rates of 105l/p/day would be achieved as part of the proposed development in accordance with Policy S I 5 of the London Plan 2021, and Policy DM1 (sustainable Design & Construction Standards) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012, and the interests of sustainability and energy conservation.
description: Approval of Condition 13 (SAP Calculation & Water Efficiency Calculation) of Planning Permission ref: 17/15081/FUL (Demolition of existing garage. Erection of new two and a half storey dwelling) dated 01/02/2018
